document.full_text: the international criminal court called on the u.n. security council to take action over djibouti's failure to arrest indicted war crimes suspect sudanese president omar hassan al-bashir during a recent visit.
document.title: icc urges u.n. action on bashir visit to djibouti
lines_and_colors: the international criminal court called on the u.n. security council to take action over djibouti's failure to arrest indicted war crimes suspect sudanese president omar hassan al-bashir during a recent visit.
